get.summary: Gets the state of a long running operation.

parameters.name: snapshot
parameters.description: Snapshot identifier for the long running operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

label.description: The label the key-value belongs to.

content_type.description: The content type of the value stored within the key-value.

last_modified.description: A date representing the last time the key-value was modified.

locked.description: Indicates whether the key-value is locked.

etag.description: A value representing the current state of the resource.

status.description: The current status of the snapshot.

filters.description: A list of filters used to filter the key-values included in the snapshot.

composition_type.description: The composition type describes how the key-values within the snapshot are composed. The 'key' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key. The 'key_label' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key and label.

created.description: The time that the snapshot was created.

expires.description: The time that the snapshot will expire.

retention_period.description: The amount of time, in seconds, that a snapshot will remain in the archived state before expiring. This property is only writable during the creation of a snapshot. If not specified, the default lifetime of key-value revisions will be used.

size.description: The size in bytes of the snapshot.

items_count.description: The amount of key-values in the snapshot.

etag.description: A value representing the current state of the snapshot.

KeyValueFilter.description: Enables filtering of key-values. Syntax reference: https://aka.ms/azconfig/docs/restapisnapshots

key.description: Filters key-values by their key field.

label.description: Filters key-values by their label field.

tags.description: Filters key-values by their tags field.

SnapshotUpdateParameters.description: Parameters used to update a snapshot.

status.description: The desired status of the snapshot.

SnapshotListResult.description: The result of a snapshot list request.

@nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

title.description: A brief summary of the error.

name.description: The name of the parameter that resulted in the error.

detail.description: A detailed description of the error.

status.description: The HTTP status code that the error maps to.

OperationDetails.description: Details of a long running operation.

id.description: The unique id of the operation.

status.description: The current status of the operation

error.description: An error, available when the status is `Failed`, describing why the operation failed.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InnerError.description: An object containing specific information about an error.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

KeyListResult.description: The result of a list request.
